thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: Over the last several months, I kept seeing the name Thrift Books mentioned by other homeschoolers. I've always been a bargain shopper and usually try to find books at my local used book store. Last month I purchased around 40 books from Thrift Books in preparation for next school year. I have not been disappointed with any of the books I've received! The quality is exactly as described and the shipping was super fast! Thrift Books is now my go-to place for books.
